subject: Football
Colleges and Universities
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: The university police chief at East Carolina said the university would use only local officers following complaints of excessive force after fans charged the field to celebrate the Pirates’ upset of West Virginia. Scott Shelton, the chief, said the department had completed an initial inquiry and identified police officers and sheriff’s deputies from various agencies shown in video clips of incidents after the game.
